contentrichtext.text: {{Wikipedia:Multilingual statistics (archive header)}} === Article count, monthly totals === The table below shows the article count for the first day of each month for the currently functioning Wikipedia projects. {{Wikipedia:Multilingual monthly statistics (2001)}} === Article count, monthly change === The following table shows the net monthly growth or decline of each Wikipedia project, by setting out the number of new articles, minus deletions, since the previous monthly count. {{Wikipedia:Multilingual monthly statistics - new articles (2001)}} [[Category:Multilingual statistics archive]] [[Category:Wikipedia multilingual coordination|Multilingual statistics]]
